main.name: Vinicius Costa
main.bio: Hi there! I am Vini, born and raised in Brazil. My passion for tech have started because typing is better than writing (I have CP), even thought my carrer had started with managing Building Constructions and Maintence, and also after that IT Supervisor (with focus in infra), coding was always there. Before I start my own company at age 26 and work with tech, this experience above allow me to understand all processes inside a company and therefore help my clients to fully translate their requirements into code. Along this journey, I’ve realised that helping others to succeed and pursue their goals is my passion and purpose.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me. I'd glad to help!

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Building system for college and schools to help them to manage their operations. We are focus on Moodle and integrated their system to make their lives smooth...

testimonials.text: Vinícius is an intelligent, agile person, always willing to help people and spares no effort and time to carry out the activities. A promising one in the area of ​​programming and the like.

Vinicius Costa has been key person in the development of our student service platform. Dedicated and committed to the project, he is always willing to analyze and propose innovative solutions in constant search for better technological options.
testimonials.user: Maria Gorette Lourenço Nobre – Administrative Director of UNIFAAT
